summary: A mother and her two teenage daughters move into an ancient house in a suburb of Detroit, when it is offered at a very low price.
cast: Jeri Ryan|Kay Panabaker|Peyton List|Ian Kahn|Marianne Jean-Baptiste|Lauren Mae Shafer|Sarab Kamoo|Jordan Trovillion|John Hawkinson|Sidi Henderson|Mike Shreeman|Peter Tocco|Julianne Somers|Mary Callaghan Lynch|Linda Boston|Jacqueline Pinol|Reila Aphrodite|Derek Berk|Rob Burns|Pamela Croydon|Jacqueline Forton|Steven Hauptman|Krystal Katz|Bill Lumbert|Jojuan Westmoreland
title: Secretos en las paredes
